title: Game Culture and Play-Based Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Instructional design strategies emphasizing gamification mechanics for workplace learners

learning_goals: Learners analyze core elements of game culture and design three or more play-based strategies applicable to educational content.
Learners develop and execute one activity tailored to real lecture scenarios using digital/analog play elements.
Learners identify two or more ethical issues that may arise in play-based learning design and propose solutions.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
